maha ithihasagnyayage satahan (kri.pu. 100 pamana) saha una anuwarshika wartha wani aithihasika mulashrawala shan rajawanshayata perapawathi sthira likhitha madhyayak nomathi wu shiya rajawanshaya (kri.pu. 2070‚Äì1600 pamana) nam rajawanshaya pilibanda sandahan we.[3][4] sahasrayakata pera niyolithika yugaye kaha ganga saha yansi ganga nimna awata wiwidha sthana kendra karaganimin sanskruthiya godanagunath, kaha ganga china shishtacharaye thotilla lesa salakeyi.

rathnapura pradeshaye pradhana pele manik wyaparikayaku wana deshabandu nimal pathirana (57) mahatharohal gathawa sitiyadi athurudanwa athi bawa ohuge pawule gnyathin danwa siti.kirulapana, polhengoda pradeshaye niwasaka padinchiwa siti ohu athi wuasanipa thaththwayak hethuwen ikuth 20 wana dina diyaniyakage swami purushaya wisin dakunu kolambaa shikshanarohalata athulath kirimen pasu ikuth 23da sita rohalin athurudan wi athi athara ohu yana ena siyalu than soya balu muth hamuwi natha.
